bibl.title: Greek Papyri in the Collection of New York University. I. Fourth Century Documents from Karanis. (New York University. Department of Classics. Monographs on Mediterranean Antiquity.)
bibl.seg: Lewis Naphtali (edited by), Greek Papyri in the Collection of New York University. I. Fourth Century Documents from Karanis. (New York University. Department of Classics. Monographs on Mediterranean Antiquity.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1967, 4°, xiv-66 pp. et 1 pl.

C.R. par Claire Préaux, ChrEg 43 (1968) No. 85, pp. 194-197. - Dieter Hagedorn, Gnomon 41 (1969) pp. 742-746. - J. Pegueroles, StPap 8 (1969) pp. 70-71. - Fritz Uebel, BibO 28 (1971) pp. 56-59. - Marcel Hombert, AntCl 40 (1971) pp. 771-774. - Augusto Traversa, RBPhil 46 (1968) p. 1431.
